12  template< class XValueType >
13  class KSWriteROOTConditionOutput :
14  public KSComponentTemplate< KSWriteROOTConditionOutput<XValueType>, KSWriteROOTCondition >
15  {
16  public:
17  KSWriteROOTConditionOutput() :
18  fMinValue( -1.0*std::numeric_limits< XValueType >::max() ),
19  fMaxValue( std::numeric_limits<XValueType>::max() ),
20  fComponent( 0 ),
21  fValue( 0 )
22  {
23  }
24  KSWriteROOTConditionOutput( const KSWriteROOTConditionOutput& aCopy ) :
25  KSComponent(aCopy),
26  fMinValue( aCopy.fMinValue ),
27  fMaxValue( aCopy.fMaxValue ),
28  fComponent( aCopy.fComponent ),
29  fValue( aCopy.fValue )
30  {
31  }
32  KSWriteROOTConditionOutput* Clone() const
33  {
34  return new KSWriteROOTConditionOutput( *this );
35  }
36  virtual ~KSWriteROOTConditionOutput()
37  {
38  }
39 
40  void CalculateWriteCondition( bool& aFlag )
41  {
42  if ( *fValue >= fMaxValue || *fValue <= fMinValue )
43  {
44  aFlag = false;
45  return;
46  }
47 
48  aFlag = true;
49  return;
50  }
51 
52 
53  protected:
54  ;K_SET_GET(double, MinValue);
55  ;K_SET_GET(double, MaxValue);
56  ;K_SET_GET_PTR(KSComponent, Component);
57  ;K_SET_GET_PTR( XValueType, Value );
58 
59  };
